Recap: Tea tells Elijah that she won't be motivated by his threats and intends to win the case for Matthew. Meanwhile, Rex is able to find out for Blair that a man by the name of Ross Rayburn disappeared from the island the same time that Tea did. Gigi does not know what to do regarding Rex and the fact that Stacy is pregnant. But Roxy encourages Gigi never to give up on her son nor let Stacy win. Stacy talks to her friend about a way that she can "hang on" to Rex and have everybody believing she is still pregnant. Todd talks to his son Jack and asks him how he feels about his parents having joint custody of him. And Jack encourages his father to pursue his relationship with Tea.
